name: Blocktopus
description:
Blocktopus:

In a world where everyone is an octopus, you, 5-year-old Lil’ Junior, must clean up all his toys before the teacher comes in, and gives you detention. Just watch out for his classmates Sarah and Joel, who are both still playing around. Sort as many blocks as you can in 2 minutes in this fast-paced, colorful adventure!

This virtual reality game was created in Spring 2019 using the Visualization Immersive Reality Lab (VIRL) of the Department of Visualization at Texas A&M University under the guidance of Hadeel Ramadan and Soumitra Goswami.

Credits: 

Reagan Woodlock - Project Manager, Game Design, Model/Texture Assistance, VFX, UI / UX 

Daniel Leon - Environment Building, Modeling, Game Design, Sound

Emma Hudroge - Modeling, Texturing, Rigging, Animation 

Brendan Hutchins - Programmer 

Priscilla “Libby” Davis - Concept Art, Game Design, UI / UX, Art Bible
